snippet.title: Salvation Hours - Announcement Trailer - Steam #indiegame
snippet.description:
#indiedev #gamedev #gamedevelopment #devlog #ue5 #solodeveloper

Wishlist now on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2797820/Salvation_Hours/

I am a solo developer making this game. It's been a journey of around 2 years into making "Salvation Hours" a reality, from scratch, using all my hard-work and dedication. Your support is appreciated. "Salvation Hours" is a First Person - Single player - Tactical Shooter based on the events of 2012 Attack on American Consulate in Benghazi.

Salvation Hours coming 25th June 2024

Track - Timelock by Epikton

Thanks for Watching !
Visit - https://wolfwirestudios.com
Artstation - https://artstation.com/paradoxical95
Support me :) - https://www.patreon.com/wolfwirestudios
Threads - https://www.threads.net/wolfwirestudios
Twitter - https://twitter.com/wolfwire_studio
Do drop a like and subscribe for more!

#wolfwirestudios
